summary: The diff only modifies project_state.json, which is a metadata/tracking file that records feature requests as 'pending'. No actual frontend implementation files were added or modified. All 8 requirements (REQ-1 through REQ-8) remain unimplemented â€” none of the required React components, context stores, webhook functions, toggle logic, AI modules, export functions, or connection status indicators have been built.

missing_requirements.requirement: Fix the API settings configuration form so that all fields are properly persisted to state/storage and included in all outgoing requests using a centralized config store.
missing_requirements.reason: No frontend source files were added or modified. The project_state.json only records this as a pending task (AR-8). No React context, localStorage hooks, or settings form components were created.

missing_requirements.requirement: Fix all webhook trigger functions to correctly send HTTP POST requests with proper JSON body and headers.
missing_requirements.reason: No frontend source files were added or modified. The project_state.json only records this as a pending task (AR-9). No webhook trigger functions were implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add comprehensive error handling, logging, and response status validation to all webhook and API calls, including a visible Webhook Log panel.
missing_requirements.reason: No frontend source files were added or modified. The project_state.json only records this as a pending task (AR-10). No error handling, logging infrastructure, or Webhook Log panel component was created.

missing_requirements.requirement: Fix automation toggles on the Automation Page so each one truly enables or disables its corresponding feature, with persisted toggle state.
missing_requirements.reason: No frontend source files were added or modified. The project_state.json records this as a pending task (AR-4). No toggle state management or persistence logic was implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Fix the AI Smart Systems modules so that AI responses from OpenRouter/OpenAI are correctly fetched and displayed in the dashboard.
missing_requirements.reason: No frontend source files were added or modified. The project_state.json records this as a pending task (AR-5). No AI module request/response handling was implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Fix Razorpay payment webhook handling and WhatsApp auto-reply triggers with proper validation and payload structure.
missing_requirements.reason: No frontend source files were added or modified. The project_state.json records this as a pending task (AR-6). No Razorpay or WhatsApp trigger logic was implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure PDF and CSV exports work correctly across all dashboard modules including Leads, AI Smart Systems results, WhatsApp Logs, Invoices, and the Data Export Center.
missing_requirements.reason: No frontend source files were added or modified. The project_state.json records this as a pending task (AR-7). No export functionality was implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a real-time connection status indicator for each configured integration with Test Connection buttons for CRM and Automation Webhook URLs.
missing_requirements.reason: No frontend source files were added or modified. The project_state.json does not record REQ-8 with a distinct AR entry linked to it. No status indicator or test connection UI was implemented.
